quotes: Be grateful. It could always be worse. Like... Monday.
Say thanks for the little things. Like Wi-Fi and being left on read.
Appreciate what you have. Especially naps.
Be thankful you only embarrassed yourself online today.
Gratitude is powerful. So is denial.
Gratitude helps you focus. On how tired you are.
Say thanks for still being here. And still weird.
Appreciate everything. Or just the fact that itâ€™s over.
